name: Lok Vikas Samiti

address: Lok Vikas Samiti Suman Tent House Premise

briefDescription: LVS is a registered nonpolitical and secular organization register under societyâ€™s registration act 1856 with rich mentoring of Paras Bhai follower of Dhrendra Majumdar (Dhirendra Bhai) a well  known  Gandhian.Vision:To create hope and dignity for weaker, marginalized & vulnerable group of society towards establishing society full of justice and equality.Mission:  The mission of LVS is to organize the vulnerable groups of society and advocate the issues related to social discrimination in a manner that empower them to access and exercise their rights and entitlement.
